#quick start

=quick start=

  # checkout the trunk with 
{{{
svn checkout http://metricanalyzer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ metricanalyzer-read-only
}}}
  # run a simple analysis with 
{{{
mvn -P analyzer compile -Dmaven-project-path=.
}}}
  # open the analysis from ./target/analysis/tests.html or
  # open the ordered list from ./target/analysis/orderedList.html
